example: This is sculpture that I made that -- it's magnetically levitated .
example_meaning: Công trình mà tôi tạo ra -- nó bay lên bằng từ tính.
definition: (transitive) To cause to rise in the air and float, as if in defiance of gravity.

example: Burton was sleeping shortly before 7 am on September 27 when, according to the driver, the bus skidded off the road (the E4, 12 miles (19 km) north of Ljungby), and flipped onto the grass in Kronoberg County.
example_meaning: Burton chỉ vừa chợp mắt không lâu trước 7 giờ sáng ngày 27 tháng 9, mà theo lời tài xế, chiếc xe bus trượt bánh khỏi đường (E4, 12 dặm về phía bắc của Ljungby), và lật úp trên bãi cỏ ở Kronoberg County Burton bị hất văng khỏi cửa sổ xe bus, bị xe đè lên người và gây ra cái chết cho ông.
definition: An out of control sliding motion as would result from applying the brakes too hard in a car.

example: How much more suffering , how much more suffering must we take?
example_meaning: Bao nhiêu sự đau khổ , Bao nhiêu đau khổ nữa chúng ta phải nhận?
definition: Experiencing pain.syn.

example: And then whined about it like a wounded dog.

example: My screeching iguana clock does tend to startle some people.

example: Indeed, if all the oxygen in the kiln is consumed in the fire, then the partial pressure of CO2 in the kiln can be as high as 20 kPa.

definition: An oven or furnace or a heated chamber, for the purpose of hardening, burning, calcining or drying anything; for example, firing ceramics or curing or preserving tobacco.

example: In spite of his condition he had no timidity about inching forward a bit on the spotless floor of the living room.

definition: shyness

example: I need moolah .

example: Would participating in such practices really be fitting for any of God’s people?
example_meaning: Việc tham gia những tập tục như thế có thật sự thích hợp cho dân Đức Chúa Trời không?

example: Our method of construction requires flexibility .

example: It goes without saying that health is more important than wealth.
example_meaning: Chẳng cần phải nói cũng hiểu sức khỏe quan trọng hơn tiền bạc.
definition: The state of being free from physical or psychological disease, illness, or malfunction; wellness. [from 11th c.]

example: You decorate Dad's office and now you're a decorator ?
example_meaning: Em đã trang trí văn phòng bố và giờ em là chuyên gia trang trí hử?

example: Dan didn't even try to hide that feeling.
example_meaning: Dan thậm chí chẳng cố giấu cảm xúc đó.

example: When improvisation , resourcefulness, imagination are key,

example: Conniving and as cruel as they come.

example: Criminal record, divorce, an actual skeleton in your closet?
example_meaning: Hồ sơ tội phạm, ly hôn, một bộ xương trong tủ quần áo của cậu?
definition: (anatomy) The system that provides support to an organism, internal and made up of bones and cartilage in vertebrates, external in some other animals.

example: Disinform .

example: In her first trimester, she contracted German measles .
